faq_entries.question: Confirmation of Registration
faq_entries.answer: After application and payment are received and identification document is approved, a confirmation of registration email will be sent. Please allow up to 10 business days to process paper-based Application Form (we strongly recommend online registration).

"&l=" + l : ""; j.async = true; j.src = "https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=" + i + dl; f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f); })(window, document, "script", "dataLayer", "GTM-P8DSBC3"); Skip to main content Skip to navigation Skip to contact information Menu Menu Facebook Facebook Instagram Instagram Official Test Centre Home About IELTS What is IELTS? Academic or General Training Test Format Contact Us Registration Procedures Application Form Test Fee Confirmation of Registration Cancellation, Transfer & Refunds Special Circumstance Arrangements Dates & Locations Computer-delivered Test Dates Paper-based Test Dates Test Venues Test Results Test Report form (TRF) Enquiry on Results Test Day Information Test Schedule Test Day Advice Rules & Regulations Photos & Finger Scanning Preparing for IELTS Common Questions Confirmation of Registration After application and payment are received and identification document is approved, a confirmation of registration email will be sent. Please allow up to 10 business days to process paper-based Application Form (we strongly recommend online registration). A detailed confirmation including the test date, location, registration time, start time and what you will need to bring on test day, will be sent 5–10 business days prior to the scheduled test day. This confirmation will be made by e-mail. Please check your e-mail regularly (including the spam folder). Only those test takers who have received written confirmation will be allowed to take the test. Please ensure test takers bring the confirmation (either electronic or paper-based) with them to register on test day. If test takers have not received detailed confirmation within 5 business days prior to first choice test date, it is their responsibility to contact the IELTS Test Centre for confirmation.
